argument.name: L
argument.description: Return type, .T. if the user is deleted; otherwise .F.

argument.name: UserId as C
argument.description: The name of the user to be deleted.

page.discussion: Context.Security.DeleteUser() delete the specified user. Check *[link:Context.Security.CallResult.Success@./index.xml#section1_CallResult]* before using the return value.
